metadata.title: CVE-2021-21860 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer truncation vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an improper memoryallocation resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causes memorycorruption. The FOURCC code, 'trik', is parsed by the function within thelibrary. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
